addonDesc.message: Kwafi Shafuka azaman hanyoyin haɗin kai ko URLs na rubutu

cpyalllnk.message: Duk Shafukan azaman hanyoyin haɗin gwiwa

cpysellnk.message: Shafukan da aka zaɓa azaman Haɗin kai

cpyseltxt.message: Shafukan da aka zaɓa azaman URLs Rubutu

cpytabtxt.message: Wannan Tab a matsayin URL Rubutu

cpyalllnknp.message: Duk Shafukan a matsayin Haɗaɗɗiya (Tsarin Sirri)

cpysellnknp.message: Shafukan da aka zaɓa a matsayin Haɗaɗɗiya (Tsarin Sirri)

cpyseltxtnp.message: Shafukan da aka zaɓa azaman URLs Rubutu (Ma'auni)

cpytabtxtnp.message: Wannan Tab a matsayin URL Rubutu (Tsarin Sirri)

cpytablnknp.message: Wannan Tab a matsayin Link (Strip Parameters)

hint_1.message: Kira ayyuka ta hanyar menu na mahallin shafin

hint_2.message: Kira ayyuka ta hanyar menu na mahallin maɓallin kayan aiki

hint_4.message: Boye ko matsar da maɓallin kayan aiki
